  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level​(java.lang.String levelName)
      Rather than using multiple classes for each of the levels, we load of txt file. Less code needs to be written then as this class can load any txt file of a level.
      Parameters:
      levelName - name of the level

  • Method Details

    • loadLevel

      public void loadLevel​(java.lang.String levelName)
      loads the level from levelName Unloads the level already loaded if needed, including disposing of sprites and textures. then loads all the things needed for the new level
      Parameters:
      levelName - name of level

    • resize

    • checkForTeleport

      public java.lang.String checkForTeleport()
      Check the players position, to see if he has entered a teleport.
      Returns:
      returns name of level to teleport to. "" if no teleport found.

    • checkForCollision

      public boolean checkForCollision​(char axis, float coordinate)
      When a character moves, this is called to find out if the move is legal.
      Parameters:
      axis - movement along what axis
      coordinate - the coordinate along axis
      Returns:
      true for valid move, false for not valid.
